item.description:
The Trouble with Pirates

Noon to 5 PM

Hosted by Chris Senhouse in the Arena

The four factions have braved the Well of Woe and the Mere of Shattered Souls. Now they split apart again, each seeking keys to the next part of the draconic prophecies held in the Caldyn Fragments.

The Blackwheel Company seeks the power of the Fragments and the Prophecy for the Dragonmarked Houses. The White Hand Battalion is the Company's branch for espionage and recruitment, and it's leader is General Mach Ogdin. Now he has a mission, and he's got you in mind...

A Xen'drik Expeditions adventure for Blackwheel Company characters only. You can either bring your own level 4 character created through the Campaign Standards at http://www.wizards.co... or jump right in with a provided Fastplay character.

Sign-ups are strongly encouraged, as we can only accept 6 players. To sign-up, please email Chris at Senhouse [AT] aol [DOT] com

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Xen'drik Expeditions @ Pandemonium Books: Blackwheel Company 4
